value.displayName: Disease caused by Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)

tr.td: Location of patient when mechanical ventilation was initiated
Patient on Airway Pressure Release Ventilation (APRV) or a related mode of mechanical ventilation at the time of VAE

value.displayName: Patient on Airway Pressure Release Ventilation (APRV) or a related mode of mechanical ventilation at the time of VAE

tr.td:
Daily minimum FiO2 increase >=0.20 (20 points) for >=2 days: Yes
Daily minimum PEEP increase >=3 cm H2O for >=2 days: No
Temperature >38°C or <36°C: Yes
White blood cell count >=12,000 or <=4,000 cells/mm3: No
A new antimicrobial agent(s) is started, and is continued for >=4 days: Yes
Criterion 1: positive culture from endotracheal aspirate without purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 1: positive culture from bronchoalveolar lavage without purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 1: positive culture from lung tissue without purulent respiratory secretions: Yes
Criterion 1: positive culture from protected specimen brush without purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 2: purulent respiratory secretions plus organism(s): No
Criterion 2: organisms from sputum culture with purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 2: organisms from endotracheal aspirate culture with purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 2: organisms from bronchoalveolar lavage culture with purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 2: organisms from lung tissue culture with purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 2: organisms from protected specimen brush culture with purulent respiratory secretions: No
Criterion 3: positive test for organism(s) identified from pleural fluid: Yes
Criterion 3: positive test for lung histopathology: No
Criterion 3: positive diagnostic test for Legionella species: No
Criterion 3: positive diagnostic test for selected viral pathogens: No

value.displayName: Ventilator Associated Event
PVAP - Possible Ventilator-Associated Pneumonia
Daily min FiO2 increase > 0.20 (20 points) for > 2 days
Daily min PEEP increase > 3 cm H2O for > 2 days
Temperature > 380 C or < 360 C
White blood cell count >= 12,000 or <= 4,000 cells/mm3
A new antimicrobial agent(s) is started, and is continued for >= 4 days
Criterion 1 - Positive culture from Endotracheal aspirate without purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 1 - Positive culture from Bronchoalveolar lavage without purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 1 - Positive culture from Lung tissue without purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 1 - Positive culture from Protected specimen brush without purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 2 - Purulent respiratory secretions plus organism(s)
Criterion 2 - Organisms from Sputum cluture with purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 2 - Organisms from Endotracheal aspirate culture with purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 2 - Organisms from Bronchoalveolar lavage culture with purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 2 - Organisms from Lung tissue culture with purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 2 - Organisms from Protected specimen brush culture with purulent respiratory secretions
Criterion 3 - Positive test Organism(s) identified from pleural fluid
Criterion 3 - Positive test for Lung histopathology
Criterion 3 - Positive Diagnostic test for Legionella species
Criterion 3 - Positive Diagnostic test for selected viral pathogens
Secondary bloodstream infection
Infection occurred post-procedure
Streptococcus pneumoniae
Pathogen rank 1
MDRO Infection or C.difficile infection
